term.title: peritectoid reaction

item.text: An isothermal, reversible reaction in the solid state, that, on cooling of a binary, ternary, ... , n system, results in one, two, ... (n-1) new solid phases. For example, in a binary system containing two solids α' and α'' Synonymous with metatectoid reaction.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 577. 'Definitions of terms relating to phase transitions of the solid state (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 588 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466030577)
